block-definition.comment: Only the lights in 'light numbers' will be visible for 'x' seconds.

block-definition.s: Set heading to %'angle' plus or minus %'range'

block-definition.comment: Called by 'get device sensor' to initialise sensor listening. Ignores all but the first time it is called.

block.l: if (typeof window.sensor_readings === 'object') { return; // already set up } window.sensor_readings = { "x acceleration": 'unknown', "y acceleration": 'unknown', "z acceleration": 'unknown', "x axis rotation": 'unknown', "y axis rotation": 'unknown', "z axis rotation": 'unknown', "latitude": 'unknown', "longitude": 'unknown', "altitude": 'unknown', }; let accelerometer; if (typeof Accelerometer === 'function') { accelerometer = new Accelerometer({frequency: 60}); accelerometer.addEventListener('reading', e => { if (typeof accelerometer.x === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['x acceleration'] = accelerometer.x; } if (typeof accelerometer.y === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['y acceleration'] = accelerometer.y; } if (typeof accelerometer.z === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['z acceleration'] = accelerometer.z; } }); } if ("permissions" in navigator) { // following from https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/AbsoluteOrientationSensor Promise.all([navigator.permissions.query({ name: "accelerometer" }), navigator.permissions.query({ name: "magnetometer" }), navigator.permissions.query({ name: "gyroscope" })]) .then(results => { if (results.every(result => result.state === "granted")) { if (accelerometer) { accelerometer.start(); } // AbsoluteOrientationSensor computes a quaternion which is a pain to convert so use this older API instead if (window.DeviceOrientationEvent) { window.addEventListener('deviceorientation', (event) => { if (typeof event.beta === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['x axis rotation'] = event.beta; } if (typeof event.gamma === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['y axis rotation'] = event.gamma; } if (typeof event.alpha === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['z axis rotation'] = event.alpha; } }); } } else { console.log("No permissions to use device orientation sensor."); } }); } if ("geolocation" in navigator) { navigator.geolocation.watchPosition(position => { const coordinates = position.coords; if (typeof coordinates.latitude === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['latitude'] = coordinates.latitude; } if (typeof coordinates.longitude === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['longitude'] = coordinates.longitude; } if (typeof coordinates.altitude === 'number') { window.sensor_readings['altitude'] = coordinates.altitude; } }, error => { console.log("Unable to access geolocation."); }, {enableHighAccuracy: true}); }

block-definition.comment: Reports the current value of a sensor if known otherwise reports 'unknown'.

input.options: x acceleration y acceleration z acceleration x axis rotation y axis rotation z axis rotation latitude longitude altitude

custom-block.s: Set heading to %n plus or minus %n
